item.title: It's A Crime That Captain America's Romance With A Supervillain Was Left Out of The MCU
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe did a good job with Captain America, but it’s a tragedy fans never got to see Steve’s romance with a supervillain.

item.title: How Karate Kid: Legends Brings Together The Original Franchise & Jackie Chan Reboot
item.description: Jackie Chan reprises his role as Mr. Han for Karate Kid: Legends, but why exactly is he back?

item.title: Star Wars: What Would Have Happened If The Empire WON?
item.description: The Galactic Empire brought untold suffering to the Star Wars galaxy, but how much worse would it have been if they had defeated the Rebellion?
